Sentencing:«Coleman has accumulated death sentences in Illinois, Indiana, and Ohio.« (1) Coleman was the only person in the country to be on death row in three different states. (2)                  
Vic treatment:«Annie received cuts so deep that her intestines were protruding into her vagina.« (2).
